name: The Fool
meaning_up: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit.
meaning_rev: Recklessness, carelessness, negligence, lack of direction.

name: The Magician
meaning_rev: Illusion, manipulation, poor planning, untapped potential.

name: The High Priestess
meaning_up: Intuition, wisdom, mystery, feminine energy, hidden knowledge.
meaning_rev: Secrets, hidden agendas, repressed emotions, lack of insight.

name: The Empress
meaning_rev: Neglect, lack of growth, dependency, creative block.

name: The Emperor
meaning_rev: Tyranny, rigidity, lack of control, inflexibility.

name: The Hierophant
meaning_rev: Rebellion, unconventionality, resistance to tradition.

name: The Lovers
meaning_up: Love, union, relationships, values alignment, harmony.
meaning_rev: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, breakups.

name: The Chariot
meaning_rev: Lack of direction, self-doubt, failure, lack of control.

name: Strength
meaning_up: Courage, inner strength, resilience, patience, compassion.
meaning_rev: Weakness, self-doubt, insecurity, lack of confidence.

name: The Hermit
meaning_rev: Isolation, loneliness, feeling lost, withdrawal.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning_up: Luck, destiny, cycles, turning points, fate.
meaning_rev: Bad luck, resistance to change, setbacks, negative cycles.

name: Justice
meaning_rev: Injustice, dishonesty, imbalance, corruption.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_up: Letting go, surrender, new perspectives, suspension.
meaning_rev: Resistance to change, lack of perspective, stalling.

name: Death
meaning_rev: Fear of change, stagnation, holding on to the past.

name: Temperance
meaning_rev: Imbalance, excess, lack of purpose, conflict.

name: The Devil
meaning_rev: Freedom from addiction, release, breaking free.

name: The Tower
meaning_rev: Avoiding disaster, fear of change, delayed collapse.

name: The Star
meaning_up: Hope, inspiration, guidance, renewal, spiritual clarity.
meaning_rev: Lack of faith, despair, hopelessness, lost direction.

name: The Moon
meaning_rev: Confusion, hidden enemies, repressed emotions.

name: The Sun
meaning_rev: Failure, pessimism, lack of confidence, delays.

name: Judgement
meaning_rev: Self-doubt, lack of accountability, rejection.

name: The World
meaning_rev: Incompletion, lack of closure, delays, dissatisfaction.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning_rev: Lack of motivation, missed opportunities, delays.

name: Two of Wands
meaning_rev: Fear of change, indecision, lack of foresight.

name: Three of Wands
meaning_rev: Lack of progress, delayed plans, obstacles.

name: Four of Wands
meaning_rev: Disruption, instability, lack of harmony, conflict.

name: Five of Wands
meaning_rev: Avoiding conflict, peace, resolution of disputes.

name: Six of Wands
meaning_rev: Failure, lack of recognition, delays, disappointment.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning_up: Defending position, courage, perseverance, standing your ground.
meaning_rev: Overwhelmed, giving up, lack of confidence.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning_up: Swift movement, progress, rapid action, momentum.
meaning_rev: Delays, setbacks, lack of progress, feeling stuck.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning_up: Resilience, persistence, guarding against adversity, determination.
meaning_rev: Burnout, exhaustion, feeling defeated, lack of energy.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning_up: Burden, responsibility, hard work, carrying a heavy load.
meaning_rev: Relief, letting go, delegation, releasing burden.

name: Page of Wands
meaning_rev: Lack of direction, immaturity, fear of change.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning_rev: Impulsiveness, recklessness, lack of direction.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning_rev: Jealousy, insecurity, self-doubt, arrogance.

name: King of Wands
meaning_rev: Dictatorship, lack of vision, arrogance, reckless.

name: Ace of Cups
meaning_up: Emotional fulfillment, love, new beginnings in relationships.
meaning_rev: Repressed emotions, emotional imbalance, lack of love.

name: Two of Cups
meaning_up: Union, partnership, mutual attraction, emotional connection.
meaning_rev: Separation, disharmony, broken relationships.

name: Three of Cups
meaning_rev: Disputes, loneliness, betrayal, lack of support.

name: Four of Cups
meaning_rev: Missed opportunities, dissatisfaction, boredom.

name: Five of Cups
meaning_up: Regret, grief, loss, focusing on the negative.
meaning_rev: Acceptance, moving on, emotional recovery, hope.

name: Six of Cups
meaning_rev: Living in the past, unable to move forward.

name: Seven of Cups
meaning_rev: Confusion, lack of focus, unrealized dreams.

name: Eight of Cups
meaning_up: Walking away, leaving behind, emotional detachment.
meaning_rev: Fear of change, staying in an unfulfilling situation.

name: Nine of Cups
meaning_up: Contentment, satisfaction, emotional stability, wish fulfillment.
meaning_rev: Lack of fulfillment, dissatisfaction, ungratitude.

name: Ten of Cups
meaning_rev: Emotional disharmony, broken relationships, disconnection.

name: Page of Cups
meaning_rev: Emotional immaturity, unrealistic expectations, childishness.

name: Knight of Cups
meaning_up: Romantic, idealistic, charm, following dreams, compassion.
meaning_rev: Unrealistic expectations, emotional instability, lack of direction.

name: Queen of Cups
meaning_rev: Emotional insecurity, manipulation, mood swings.

name: King of Cups
meaning_rev: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, lack of balance.

name: Ace of Swords
meaning_up: Clarity, truth, intellectual breakthroughs, new ideas.
meaning_rev: Confusion, lack of clarity, dishonesty, misunderstanding.

name: Two of Swords
meaning_up: Decision, stalemate, balancing options, inner conflict.
meaning_rev: Indecision, avoidance, confusion, inability to make choices.

name: Three of Swords
meaning_rev: Healing, recovery, forgiveness, emotional release.

name: Four of Swords
meaning_rev: Burnout, exhaustion, restlessness, inability to relax.

name: Five of Swords
meaning_rev: Resolution, making amends, retreat, avoiding conflict.

name: Six of Swords
meaning_up: Transition, moving on, change, mental clarity.
meaning_rev: Stagnation, resistance to change, unresolved issues.

name: Seven of Swords
meaning_rev: Revealing the truth, honesty, confession, accountability.

name: Eight of Swords
meaning_rev: Freedom, release, breaking free from restrictions.

name: Nine of Swords
meaning_up: Anxiety, fear, nightmares, stress, mental anguish.
meaning_rev: Hope, healing, overcoming fears, recovery from anxiety.

name: Ten of Swords
meaning_up: Betrayal, painful endings, crisis, rock bottom.
meaning_rev: Recovery, regeneration, the worst is over, rebirth.

name: Page of Swords
meaning_rev: Gossip, dishonesty, spying, immaturity.

name: Knight of Swords
meaning_rev: Rashness, recklessness, impulsive decisions, hasty actions.

name: Queen of Swords
meaning_rev: Coldness, bitterness, manipulation, judgment.

name: King of Swords
meaning_rev: Manipulation, cruelty, abuse of power, dishonesty.

name: Ace of Pentacles
meaning_up: New opportunities, abundance, prosperity, material gains.
meaning_rev: Missed opportunities, lack of resources, insecurity.

name: Two of Pentacles
meaning_up: Balance, adaptability, time management, juggling priorities.
meaning_rev: Instability, imbalance, disorganization, lack of control.

name: Three of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Lack of cooperation, poor teamwork, failure to collaborate.

name: Four of Pentacles
meaning_up: Security, control, holding on, financial stability.
meaning_rev: Greed, materialism, stinginess, lack of security.

name: Five of Pentacles
meaning_up: Financial loss, hardship, lack of resources, isolation.
meaning_rev: Recovery, support, new opportunities, overcoming challenges.

name: Six of Pentacles
meaning_up: Generosity, charity, balance, giving and receiving.
meaning_rev: Imbalance, inequality, selfishness, lack of charity.

name: Seven of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Impatience, lack of progress, waiting without results.

name: Eight of Pentacles
meaning_up: Diligence, hard work, mastery, skill development.
meaning_rev: Lack of focus, neglecting duties, poor quality work.

name: Nine of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Lack of independence, financial insecurity, dependence.

name: Ten of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Financial loss, lack of inheritance, broken family.

name: Page of Pentacles
meaning_up: Ambition, opportunity, new beginnings, study, learning.
meaning_rev: Lack of focus, immaturity, missed opportunities.

name: Knight of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Stagnation, laziness, lack of progress, rigidity.

name: Queen of Pentacles
meaning_rev: Neglect, instability, materialism, self-centeredness.

name: King of Pentacles
meaning_up: Wealth, leadership, financial security, business success.
meaning_rev: Greed, irresponsibility, poor financial decisions.
